Author: verasovo
Title: [ANN][PRESALE] ENZYM - Real-life social gaming
Body: How to position an ICO in a crypto bear market ?  We have been witnessing for 10 months a depressed crypto-currency market whose value has been divided by more than 3 for Bitcoin and more than 6 for Ether. Most investors in crypto currencies are in loss (especially those who invested in 2017) and it is increasingly difficult for them to reinvest for the moment on new projects. The evolution of prices is impossible to predict as the volatility is high.  In addition, prices of cryptoshave been boosted (like all assets) by the creation of the money supply (since 2012) by the major central banks, which raises fears of a deflation even more rapid when the phenomenon stops (ex: QE BCE lowered, since the 3rd quarter of 2018).  Under these conditions it is necessary to plan the ICO according to more favorable market conditions that may come, inorder to benefit from an upswing and low volatility.... ... ...  Read the full article

Author: Lunaluk
Title: [ANN][PRESALE] ENZYM - Real-life social gaming
Body: Hello, creating a project that is able to carry out the movement of the player between the real and virtual, of course an interesting idea, but I do not quite understand what technology you use?

Author: enzym-ceo
Title: [ANN][PRESALE] ENZYM - Real-life social gaming
Body: Hi! I am not sure to properly understand your question. So I try an answer üòä The technology we are using:  to geolocalize the user: the smartphone geolocation feature for now and later we will add some wireless p2p communications to make it work inside buildings and to make it safer to guide the user : for now it is an arrow showing the approximative direction like a compass (but the "north" is the destination) and later we will add an optional Augmented Reality mode  best regards

Author: verasovo
Title: [ANN][PRESALE] ENZYM - Real-life social gaming
Body: Enzym does not keep or sell user data üîí On the other hand, you can check out the inner workings of our dApp which is totally transparent and available in opensource üôå Social and transparent from top to bottom, was an obvious decision from our CTO Sylvain Duchesne üî• He designed Enzym way before the prototype, imagining its structure, functionnalities, we basically owe him everythingüíò Irritated by our society, Sylvain takes his frustration onto lines of code and hords of Huns in Age of Empires. He is also quite passionated about the blockchain and loves challenges, do not hesitate to ask him a good one in the comment section üòâ    Clic on the picture to see the article !

Author: patrickrn32
Title: [ANN][PRESALE] ENZYM - Real-life social gaming
Body: Enzym  will not be a social network where you add a person to your friend list, because they look friendly. On Enzym, we add someone to our friends list because we had a good time with them and we plan to spend more time together. We want to avoid the systematic aggregation paradigm that characterises today's social networks and leads to a race for numbers. This trend creates confusion between true friends and superficial relationships.

Author: hirokazu
Title: [ANN][PRESALE] ENZYM - Real-life social gaming
Body: Is this like Pokemon-Go? That need reality place and we must go to the specific place to catch/earn something special? I hope the quest will be based on local location on a country, because if it too far, will make someone desperate because of doubt about a long journey.

Author: enzym-ceo
Title: [ANN][PRESALE] ENZYM - Real-life social gaming
Body: Hi, yes you 're right ! the concept of Enzym has been set up to develop a local social network, so very near to you, to allow you to realize the challenge in - of 30 'in general. But for later, challenges with a longer distance with a important gain in Zyms tokens could be considered.  best regards

Author: verasovo
Title: [ANN][PRESALE] ENZYM - Real-life social gaming
Body: You are right. We really want to promote local interactions. No need to go too far for different reasons : 1) you'll meet easily someone near your location 2) the interest from the partners of Enzyms (caf√©s, meeting places,...) will be higher if they can attract people from the area (they will maybe come again). 3) You'll want to do it when you have 30 minutes free; not take a long day for one mission and meet max one people.  Maybe the idea of a longer trip may be considered for big events with a lot of people.

Author: enzym-ceo
Title: [ANN][PRESALE] ENZYM - Real-life social gaming
Body: Hi, The ZYM is the fuel of the application, the more the activity will grow, the more the price will rise. To each friend, a ZYM will be frozen on both sides. It is easy to imagine the senario with a lot of activity.  Best regards

Author: verasovo
Title: [ANN][PRESALE] ENZYM - Real-life social gaming
Body: Indeed... Sorry, I forgot to answer this part of the question :  If your token are frozen until the deletion of a friend (the purpose it to make friends quickly. You'll not freeze your tokens eternally), you'll have more and more frozen token.  But it is the same for other users.  And more the App is used, more tokens will be frozen.  So, each token will have more value.  It is like the PoS tokens, if people freezes their token for the stack, there are less token into circulation and the token has more value !

Author: rongyanjusou
Title: [ANN][PRESALE] ENZYM - Real-life social gaming
Body: Where can i see the procss, it would be good to see iive stats on investments. That could be good for investors and also the team.I just finished reading the white paper and the project looks very promising. Will wait for more information!

Author: verasovo
Title: [ANN][PRESALE] ENZYM - Real-life social gaming
Body: Hi. Those information will be available mid-september. The final White Paper will also be available around this time. For the investors, more the App will be used, more the ZYM will have an higher value. I explain : when someone add a friend, some tokens are frozen until the friendship is deleted (the purpose of the App is really to meet NEW people). More people = more friends = more frozen token. If a token is frozen, it is unusable (as when you freeze your PoS token for some cryptocurrencies) so the ZYM has more and more value.  The ZYM has 18 decimal so it can reach higher value without problem for the App.

Author: Pao971
Title: [ANN][PRESALE] ENZYM - Real-life social gaming
Body: WHY ENZYM? Because you should not have to chose between technology and socialisation There is nothing wrong with checking today's weather on your phone rather than opening the window, it's no big deal to spend 45min on the toilet playing #CandyCrush or to rely on Facebook to remember you own mother's birthday. A lil bit though, but it shoud not prevent you from making new friends or meeting someone.    For whom? For the bored, those thirsty for adventures and discoveries and everyone else.    How? Enzym, means spontaneous encounters, just like IRL, but better. No fake profiles, no endless chatting, no creeps, just other players close to you. Win challenges to earn ZYMs, use your ZYMs to chat with strangers or throw challenges and much more !    Ready? Register now on www.enzym.io !

Author: verasovo
Title: [ANN][PRESALE] ENZYM - Real-life social gaming
Body: Enzym places itself on two important markets: ‚óè The market of mobile marketing ($200 billion last year, of which $111 billion were related to geolocalized marketing, and a 38% growth rate). ‚óè The market of online dating.   The market of online dating is expected to generate a revenue of $5 billion in 2018 and achieve an annual growth rate of4.6%.Matchmaking services are the most important activity and the United States are the biggest segment, with projected revenues of $2.8 billion and $1.7 billion respectively. Most of the revenues come from monthly subscriptions.    The average internet user also went from having 3 social media accounts in 2012 to having 8 in 2016. This diversification is caused by a certain degree of specialization, as 13 users turn to platforms which allow them to network in specific ways to suit specific needs. The generalization of smartphones also did a lot for the surge in the use of social networking services by offering unprecedented accessibility, portability and instantaneity.  Facebook is the leader with $40.7 billion (in 2017) in revenue from targeted advertising and data sales. Most of the other social networking services have a similar economic model. The amount of users on these platforms is expected to grow by an average 4.5% in the next few years

Author: verasovo
Title: [ANN][PRESALE] ENZYM - Real-life social gaming
Body: ENZYM - Real-life social gaming                      Read our White Paper !  [ANN] en Fran√ßais  The Translation Bounty post  Organisator and Influencers Bounty Post   _______________________________________________________________________________ _  ENZYM? What is it? _______________________________________________________________________________ _  Enzym is a gamified and local social network based on the blockchain technology and favoring real-life interactions. The purpose of Enzym is to inject simplicity, ease and casualness back into our nights out.   _______________________________________________________________________________ _  Why would I use it? _______________________________________________________________________________ _   Real-life interactions are bugged. Enzym is a fix. It is designed to take people where they are talking there language and bring them back to the real-life teaching them how it works. Most young people are now used to or even addicted to instantness and gaming.   We believe that face-to-face human interactions are valuable and irreplaceable. We believe that real and virtual interactions should complement rather than compete with each other. We note that real-life interactions have become tricky and we remark that virtual spaces could be used to make reality attractive and get people back to it. Our purpose is to make it easy again for people who don‚Äôt know each other to have friendly spontaneous exchanges.  In order to execute this mission we will build a venue-based social network which will facilitate get-togethers and foster local instantaneous meetings with new people.   The obligation of physical presence and the reputation system will protect users from scams and bad behaviors. The application will firmly secure the users' data to ensure the respect of their privacy and the confidentiality of their interactions. The platform as a whole will evolve towards maximal decentralization and transparency thanks to technologies such as the Ethereum blockchain.   This application will be a game, and as such it will harness the full power of gamification with accomplishments, rewards, creativity incentives, constraints and a scoring system, to cultivate social boldness and make physical spaces more appealing. The user will use all the application‚Äôs features without spending a dime. He will, however, need to spend ZYMs ‚Äì ERC20 tokens ‚Äì which he‚Äôll acquire through local interactions ruled by smart contracts.  _______________________________________________________________________________ _  What for the future? _______________________________________________________________________________ _    _______________________________________________________________________________ _  The Trailers (you need to turn the subtitles on) _______________________________________________________________________________ _      _______________________________________________________________________________ _  The Token? _______________________________________________________________________________ _  ZYM tokens will be required for the use of the Enzym application. Any interaction with strangers will cost some ZYMs to at least one of the participants and others may be rewarded. Venue owners will be able to buy ZYMs easily from their accounts on our dedicated website. They will also be able to fine-tune how and when these tokens are distributed to their customers.  As part of its business model the Enzym platform will charge a 2% transaction fee to every ZYM transaction.    _______________________________________________________________________________ _  To play and to be safe _______________________________________________________________________________ _  As an exemple here is how the ‚Äútreasure hunt‚Äù challenge works. A user asks or is offered to participate in a treasure hunt. Another user nearby is contacted and offered to be the treasure in question. If he or she accepts, the hunter then receives a picture of him or her, or some informations, and the name of the place he or she is at. The hunter then has to go to said place, find the treasure and prove he found it with NFC or by scanning a QR code on the treasure's smartphone. Tokens and loots are won by all and a friendly encounter just happened. They may as well have a drink and a chat while they're here.      But your safety is always guaranteed by :  The use of a strong cryptography : It will ensure the safety of users data and the confidentiality of their exchanges. Chat messages will be readable only by their recipient. Quantum-proof encryption algorithms, which are still in development, will be used as soon as a reliable standard emerges Anonymous metadata : The Enzym team will only be able to access anonymous metadata, most of which will be public. Transparancy : Each user will have complete control over his personal data. He will choose what he shares publicly at any moment  _______________________________________________________________________________ _  Token Allocation _______________________________________________________________________________ _                                  _______________________________________________________________________________ _  The Team _______________________________________________________________________________ _                                          _______________________________________________________________________________ _  The advisors _______________________________________________________________________________ _        _______________________________________________________________________________ _  ICO Information _______________________________________________________________________________ _  Under reconstruction   ---------------------------------------------------------------------

Author: verasovo
Title: [ANN][PRESALE] ENZYM - Real-life social gaming
Body: Here are our targets :  Soft cap : it is the minimal amount needed to ensure the viability of the project. The public offer will end on the 10th of December 2018. If less than 1250 ETH is raised at the end of the public offer, the money will be given back to the pre-sale and sale buyers. Middle cap : evaluated at 12 500 ETH, the middle cap will offer the opportunity for the Enzym project to achieve a fast growth in R&D and commercial development.  Hard Cap : 25 000 ETH is the maximal amount that can be collected. It would be the ideal situation to permit a fast development on the international market.   I assume you knew what Soft Cap and Hard Cap are but it is always good for people whom just began into the crypto world

Title: [ANN][PRESALE] ENZYM - Real-life social gaming
